name: Eden Reforestation Projects
description: Eden aims at reducing extreme poverty and restore healthy forests by employing local people to plant millions of trees every year. They work with local communities to restore forests on a massive scale, thereby creating jobs, protecting ecosystems and helping mitigate climate change.
